RoboZombie 1.3.2 API

Packages
com.lonepulse.robozombie Contains the core contracts and implementations which are common to all modules.
com.lonepulse.robozombie.annotation Contains the set of annotations which are used to define an endpoint on an interface.
com.lonepulse.robozombie.executor Contains a set of core and auxiliary classes which directs the execution of requests and manages the presentation of response results.
com.lonepulse.robozombie.processor Contains the contracts and abstract implementations which provide the infrastructure to process requests and responses using the meta-data on an endpoint.
com.lonepulse.robozombie.proxy Contains the set of core and auxiliary classes which allows an endpoint definition interface to be validated and its mirrored proxy to be injected.
com.lonepulse.robozombie.request Contains the set of core and auxiliary classes which create requests and process requests for a proxy invocation using the annotated meta-data found on the endpoint definition.
com.lonepulse.robozombie.response Contains the set of core and auxiliary classes which process requests of successful request executions for a proxy invocation using the annotated meta-data found on the endpoint definition.
com.lonepulse.robozombie.util Contains a set of utility classes which isolate common and trivial tasks.
org.apache.http42 Contains a verbatim copy of the Consts class which exists in API version 4.2 of Apache HTTP Components.
org.apache.http42.client.methods Contains a verbatim copy of the HttpPatch class which exists in API version 4.2 of Apache HTTP Components.
org.apache.http42.client.utils Contains verbatim copies of the URIBuilder and URLEncodedUtils classes which exists in API version 4.2 of Apache HTTP Components.
org.apache.http42.entity Contains a verbatim copy of the ContentType class which exists in API version 4.2 of Apache HTTP Components.
org.apache.http42.protocol Contains a verbatim cpoy of the HTTP class which exists in API version 4.2 of Apache HTTP Components.
org.apache.http42.util Contains a verbatim cpoy of the EntityUtils class which exists in API version 4.2 of Apache HTTP Components.
